title: Number of Vetoes and Bills Passed

content.prompt: Which of the following statements is best supported by the line graph?

choices.label: The number of vetoes has generally increased since 1945, even though the number of bills passed by Congress has decreased.
The number of vetoes has generally decreased since 1945, but so has the number of bills passed by Congress.
The number of vetoes has generally decreased since 1945, but the number of bills passed by Congress has increased.
The number of vetoes has generally increased since 1945, but so has the number of bills passed by Congress.

topic.text: 2.4: Roles and Powers of the President

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Describe patterns and trends in data.
